directions: Beat eggs until frothy.  Stir in pumpkin, corn syrup, sugar, cinnamon, and salt.  Pour into pie shell.  Sprinkle with pecans.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 50 to 60 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.  Chill.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Pumpkin Pecan Pie III
